abstract: Supreme Court rules in case Omnicare v Laborers District Council Construction Industry Pension Fund that statements couched as opinions in securities filings may sometimes be used as basis for securities fraud suits.
lead_paragraph: Statements of opinion in securities filings are untrue only if they are not sincerely held, Justice Elena Kagan wrote for the majority.

headline.main: Justices Rule Opinions May Sometimes Be Basis for Securities Fraud Suits
